players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I think Alice is the mafia. I don't know for sure, but she seems suspicious."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he'll lie. Alice is innocent."
You: "Bob, if you were mafia you would have killed Charlie. So you can't be mafia. Diana says Bob is mafia, but Bob says Alice is mafia. One of you must be lying."
Diana: "Bob is mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he'll lie. Alice is innocent."
Bob: "Alice, I think Diana is lying about me. She might be mafia. I think you are innocent."
You: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Bob (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I think Alice is the mafia. I don't know for sure, but she seems suspicious."
Diana: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he'll lie. Alice is innocent."
Alice: "Bob, if you were mafia you would have killed Charlie. So you can't be mafia. Diana says Bob is mafia, but Bob says Alice is mafia. One of you must be lying."
Diana: "Bob is mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he'll lie. Alice is innocent."
You: "Alice, I think Diana is lying about me. She might be mafia. I think you are innocent."
Alice: remained silent.

You: "I investigated Bob and found him mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he'll lie. Alice is innocent."
Alice: "Bob, if you were mafia you would have killed Charlie. So you can't be mafia. Diana says Bob is mafia, but Bob says Alice is mafia. One of you must be lying."
You: "Bob is mafia. He knows I'm detective, so he'll lie. Alice is innocent."
Bob: "Alice, I think Diana is lying about me. She might be mafia. I think you are innocent."
